title: MOD安装后游戏崩溃
author: c.h.a.o.
txt_content:
{:10_492:}如题，安装MOD后，minecarft主界面出现：A list of ID conlicts has been written to the file " IDconlicts.txt" in you minecarft directory.
如何解决？

replies.author: wahaha216
replies.txt_content: 在根目录或者.minecraft下找到IDconlicts.txt。双击打开，里面写了哪个MOD的ID与哪个MOD冲突了，找到配置文件后修改就行
